Morning brief time. Do the following:
1. Check all configured Jira boards for: overdue tickets, tickets due this week, in-progress tickets with no recent updates (48h+), and any high-priority items.
2. Check recent GitHub activity on tracked repos ‚Äî any overnight PRs merged, CI failures, deploys.
3. Pull top 3 most urgent action items.
4. Check memory for yesterday's notes for continuity.
5. Deliver a concise morning brief via Telegram in this format:

6. For each finding (blockers, task updates, insights), call engie_observe with the appropriate type, summary, and tags (e.g. ticket IDs). This stores structured data in memory for future context.

Afternoon follow-up. Check for any new Jira updates since this morning. If workspace/HANDOFF.md exists and has pending work, continue it. For each status change or finding, call engie_observe with the appropriate type (task_update, blocker, insight), a concise summary, and relevant tags (ticket IDs). This stores structured data in memory for future context.
